text: hey all, I had a good conversation with Renee Ferron today, she might be a good UX resource for us. I'm going to try to get her in to meet the team. <https://renee-ferron.squarespace.com/>

attachments.title: Hello
attachments.text: Hello, Iâ€™m a strategist & designer with an interest in how people use digital interfaces, and what we can do to improve those interactions.

text: nice! is she still around? or are we scheduling another meet up with her and the team?
I'd like to plan on a two phased meeting next time: first one with the ux team to talk shop, share work samples, assess skills
If we think the's a potential candidate, then we'd have a second wave of folks meet her, probably producer/designer/ewald to assess team fit
